title: Minnow

properties.name: description
properties.value: Minnows are members-only fish that can be caught at Kylie Minnow's fishing platform at the Fishing Guild. They require a small fishing net and 82 Fishing to be caught, which cannot be boosted, granting 26.1 Fishing experience per catch of minnow. Boosting does however increase the rate at which they are caught. These catches consist of between 10-14 minnow, dependent on the player's Fishing level.

content:
This article has a money making guide: Catching minnows.
Please add tips to the subpage, rather than the article below.
Minnow
Released6 July 2017 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo
Properties
TradeableNo
EquipableNo
StackableYes
DestroyDrop
ExamineA tiny fish.
Values
Value1 coin
High alch0 coins
Low alch0 coins
Weight0 kg
Advanced data
Item ID21356

Minnows are members-only fish that can be caught at Kylie Minnow's fishing platform at the Fishing Guild. They require a small fishing net and 82 Fishing to be caught, which cannot be boosted, granting 26.1 Fishing experience per catch of minnow. Boosting does however increase the rate at which they are caught. These catches consist of between 10-14 minnow, dependent on the player's Fishing level.

The platform may only be accessed after showing Kylie the full angler's outfit and having completed the Fishing Contest quest.

Minnow fishing spots move around in a consistent 1-tile clockwise rotation at a fixed rate of 15 seconds, more rapidly than other forms of net fishing. Players can use a synced interval timer for an auditory signal notifying the player of the spot moving, or simply count a total of 10 experience drops, which is the maximum that can be received from a fishing spot before it moves.

A flying fish gobbles up the player's minnow.

In addition, a fishing spot will occasionally spawn flying fish instead of providing minnows; flying fish will eat 20 or more minnow directly from the player's inventory as long as they keep fishing there, forcing them to move to another spot. A flying fish appears only after a fishing spot has changed, and can continue to eat the player's minnows until the fishing spot changes position once again.

Minnow can be exchanged for noted raw sharks by trading with Kylie Minnow at a rate of 40 minnows for one raw shark.

Equipping the Rada's blessing from Kourend & Kebos Diary gives up to 8% chance to catch twice the amount of minnows (no experience is given for the additional catch). This works well with the stackable nature of minnows in the inventory.

While the fishing platform can only be accessed via the Fishing Guild, Minnow fishing does not benefit from the Guild's +7 invisible level boost.

  • 1 Fishing info
  • 2 Catch rates
  • 3 Item sources
  • 4 Changes

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
13 July 2017
(update)
  • The inventory icon was reduced in size due to player complaints that the number of minnows they had in their inventory was difficult to see.
  • Ghasts can no longer turn a stack of minnows into rotten food.

[[File:Minnow detail.png|left|160px]]
'''Minnows''' are [[members]]-only [[fish]] that can be caught at [[Kylie Minnow]]'s fishing platform at the [[Fishing Guild]]. They require a [[small fishing net]] and 82 [[Fishing]] to be caught, which cannot be [[boost]]ed, granting 26.1 Fishing [[experience]] per catch of minnow. Boosting does however increase the rate at which they are caught. These catches consist of between 10-14 minnow, dependent on the player's Fishing level.

The platform may only be accessed after showing Kylie the full [[angler's outfit]] and having completed the [[Fishing Contest]] quest.

Minnow fishing spots move around in a consistent 1-tile clockwise rotation at a fixed rate of 15 seconds, more rapidly than other forms of [[Fishing#Fishing spotss|net fishing]]. Players can use a synced interval timer for an auditory signal notifying the player of the spot moving, or simply count a total of 10 experience drops, which is the maximum that can be received from a fishing spot before it moves.
[[File:Flying fish.gif|left|thumb|180px|A flying fish gobbles up the player's minnow.]]
In addition, a fishing spot will occasionally spawn flying fish instead of providing minnows; flying fish will eat 20 or more minnow directly from the [[Account|player]]'s [[inventory]] as long as they keep fishing there, forcing them to move to another spot. A flying fish appears only after a fishing spot has changed, and can continue to eat the player's minnows until the fishing spot changes position once again.

Minnow can be exchanged for noted [[raw shark]]s by trading with [[Kylie Minnow]] at a rate of 40 minnows for one raw shark.

Equipping the [[Rada's blessing]] from [[Kourend & Kebos Diary]] gives up to 8% chance to catch twice the amount of minnows (no experience is given for the additional catch). This works well with the stackable nature of minnows in the inventory.

While the fishing platform can only be accessed via the Fishing Guild, Minnow fishing does not benefit from the Guild's +7 invisible level boost.
